## Try Autocomplete

1. Type `{{< fa ` and press space to see icon suggestions
2. Type `{{< fa th` to filter icons starting with "th"
3. After an icon name, press space to see `size` and `title` attributes
4. After `size=`, see all available size options
5. After `title=`, enter your accessibility text
